name: amythical
description:
IGMC 2022

today was supposed to be your usual work day

you were supposed to go home and binge watch the latest season of bizarre stuff

it turns out your quirky coworker was a god, and now you are fighting myths

sacrifice these beloved mythical creatures of old and become strong

or spare them and borrow their special abilities

depending on what you choose, the outcome will be different

will the mythical creatures of old return to their former glory?

or will they fade away forever

features

tight battles

multiple ways to play the game, brute force or strategy, depending on what you choose

light hearted story about light hearted subjects such as the death of an age and the efforts of reviving it

kinda funny characters

cute art made by yours truly

fm synth ost composed by yours truly
